title: The first 8K TV will go on sale soon for over $130,000
content:
Sharp has demonstrated Super Hi-Vision 8K displays before (as seen above during CES 2015), but today in Japan it announced an 85-inch version is going on sale October 30th. Dubbed the LV-85001, it's a monitor (it has a tuner  so you could call it a…

source: I like video games. Can you tell?
